decision_conditions: It is noted that the level monitoring is old data, concluded only in December 2020. The tree service would require a fresh report covering at least 12 months of monitoring until the present. | It is noted that satellite monitoring data has been provided. However, satellite monitoring data is unreliable, and we do not accept this. | Trees at present are providing greater benefits by suppressing traffic noise and reducing effects of pollution from North Circular Road within 15 metres of the building.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
